Package com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.curves

Class CurvesTemporalMesh.BezierLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.scene.plugins.blender.curves.CurvesTemporalMesh.BezierLine
  • Enclosing class:
    CurvesTemporalMesh
    public static class CurvesTemporalMesh.BezierLine
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class that represents a single bezier line. It consists of Edge's and allows to get a subline of a length of the line.
    Author:
    Marcin Roguski (Kaelthas)

      • getValueAlongCurve

        public com.jme.math.Vector3f getValueAlongCurve​(float alongRatio)
        The method computes the value of a point at the certain relational distance from its beginning.
        Parameters:
        alongRatio - the relative distance along the curve; should be a value between 0 and 1 inclusive; if the value exceeds the boundaries it is truncated to them
        Returns:
        computed value along the curve

      • getMaterialNumber

        public int getMaterialNumber()
        Returns:

      • isSmooth

        public boolean isSmooth()
        Returns:
        indicates if the line is smooth of flat

      • isCyclic

        public boolean isCyclic()
